definitions.definition: A round lump made up of or coated with slime or a slime-like substance such as mucus .

subdefinitions.definition: A mucus-coated lump containing the cercariae ( “ parasitic larvae ” ) of a liver fluke (of the phylum Platyhelminthes ).

definitions.definition: A person who is slimy (that is, sneaky or underhanded ) or otherwise undesirable .

main_definition: ( biology ) A round lump made up of or coated with slime or a slime-like substance such as mucus .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , originally US , colloquial , derogatory ) A person who is slimy (that is, sneaky or underhanded ) or otherwise undesirable .
